title: Bulbasaur
content: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokemon.

title: Charmander
content: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

title: Squirtle
content: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

title: Pikachu
content: When several of these Pokemon gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

title: Mewtwo
content: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

title: Gyarados
content: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

title: Ditto
content: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

title: Eevee
content: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element stones.

title: Snorlax
content: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

title: Dragonite
content: An extremely rarely seen marine Pokemon. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.
